00018     distanceFunction Dtw::distanceFunctions[] = {euclideanDistance,
00019                                                  manhattanDistance,
00020                                                  chebyshevDistance,

00028     Dtw::Dtw(const Extractor* signal):
00029         from(signal), points(signal->getFramesCount()), distanceFn(euclideanDistance),
00030         passType(Neighbors)
00031     {
00032     }

00041     double Dtw::getDistance(const Extractor* pattern, NormalizationType normalization)
00042     {
00043         calculateLocalDistances(pattern);
00044         unsigned int signalSize = from->getFramesCount();
00045         unsigned int patternSize = pattern->getFramesCount();
00046         DtwPoint *top = 0, *center = 0, *bottom = 0, *previous = 0;
00047 
00048         for (unsigned int i = 1; i < signalSize; ++i)
00049         {
00050             for (unsigned int j = 1; j < patternSize; ++j)
00051             {
00052                 center = &points[i - 1][j - 1];
00053                 if (Neighbors == passType)
00054                 {
00055                     top = &points[i - 1][j];
00056                     bottom = &points[i][j - 1];
00057                 }
00058                 else // Diagonals
00059                 {
00060                     if (i > 1 && j > 1)
00061                     {
00062                         top = &points[i - 2][j - 1];
00063                         bottom = &points[i - 1][j - 2];
00064                     }
00065                     else
00066                     {
00067                         top = &points[i - 1][j];
00068                         bottom = &points[i][j - 1];
00069                     }
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 if (top->dAccumulated < center->dAccumulated)
00073                     previous = top;
00074                 else
00075                     previous = center;
00076 
00077                 if (bottom->dAccumulated < previous->dAccumulated)
00078                     previous = bottom;
00079 
00080                 points[i][j].dAccumulated = points[i][j].dLocal + previous->dAccumulated;
00081                 points[i][j].previous = previous;
00082             }
00083         }
00084 
00085         double distance = points[signalSize - 1][patternSize - 1].dAccumulated;
00086 
00087         switch (normalization)
00088         {
00089         case Diagonal:
00090             distance /= std::sqrt(signalSize*signalSize + patternSize*patternSize);
00091             break;
00092         case SumOfSides:
00093             distance /= signalSize + patternSize;
00094             break;
00095         case NoNormalization:
00096         default:
00097             break;
00098         }
00099 
00100         return distance;
00101     }
00102 
00108     void Dtw::calculateLocalDistances(const Extractor* pattern)
00109     {
00110         unsigned int patternSize = pattern->getFramesCount();
00111         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < from->getFramesCount(); ++i)
00112         {
00113             points[i].resize(patternSize);
00114             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < patternSize; j++)
00115                 points[i][j] = DtwPoint(i, j, distanceFn(from->getVector(i), pattern->getVector(j)));
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00124     void Dtw::setDistanceFunction(int index)
00125     {
00126         int functionsCount = sizeof(distanceFunctions)/sizeof(distanceFunctions[0]);
00127         if (index > 0 && index < functionsCount)
00128         {
00129             distanceFn = distanceFunctions[index];
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00138     DtwPath Dtw::getPath()
00139     {
00140         DtwPath path;
00141 
00142         int width = points.size(), height = points[0].size();
00143 
00144         DtwPoint* point = &points[width-1][height - 1];
00145 
00146         while(point->previous != 0)
00147         {
00148             path.push_back(std::make_pair(point->x, point->y));
00149             point = point->previous;
00150         }
00151 
00152         return path;
00153     }
